about_the_game:
GastroRun: Endless Mode + All Skins Unlocked

GastroRun is a fast-paced educational adventure game where you play as Gastro, a witty nano-bot on a mission to help patients with enzyme deficiency. Navigate the human digestive system, shooting enzymes to break down food, racing nutrient-stealing “leechers,” and defending against attacking germs, all while learning about the digestive process.

DLC Features:

Endless Mode: Keep playing through various medical tiers, from pre-med to senior resident, earning XP and coins.
Unlocked Skins: Access all character skins from the start.
Ability Upgrades: Enhance your damage, fire rate, and health.
Boosters: Gain advantages in endless mode with special boosters.
Test your skills and knowledge in this unique blend of fun and learning!
